P

placeArmies() - Static method in class in.risk.utility.StartUpPhase
Method for asking the user to place armies on each country they own in round robin fashion.
placeCardsInTheDeck() - Static method in class in.risk.utility.Player
This method is used to place cards in the deck of player initially.
placeReinforcementArmies(PlayerToPlay) - Static method in class in.risk.utility.Player
This method is used to place reinforcement armies and then place them in the countries where player want to place them
placeReinforcementArmies(String, int, PlayerToPlay) - Static method in class in.risk.utility.Player
This method is used to update the countries armies according to user inputed data.
Player - Class in in.risk.utility
This class implements the Reinforcement, Attack and Fortify game phases.
Player() - Constructor for class in.risk.utility.Player
 
playerName(int) - Static method in class in.risk.utility.StartUpPhase
This method is used to ask the user to enter the player name he want to give to the player.
players - Static variable in class in.risk.utility.StartUpPhase
 
playersCards - Static variable in class in.risk.utility.Player
 
PlayerToPlay - Class in in.risk.utility
This class is used to implement the playerTOPlay class.
